WadlMetadata.WadlXml:
<application xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:service="https://tip1-shared.azure-apim.net/apim/logicflows" xmlns:siena="http://schemas.microsoft.com/MicrosoftProjectSiena/WADL/2014/11" siena:serviceId="Embeddingcanvas" xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02">
        <doc title="PowerApps to host form basic WADL communication" />
        <resources base="http://hostform/">
        <resource path="/embeddingcanvas/saveForm">
        <method siena:requiresAuthentication="false" name="POST" id="SaveForm" siena:isHostFunction="true">
        <doc title="Save the data on the host model-driven form." />
        <request>
        <param style="header" name="Function" required="true" fixed="SaveForm" />
        <representation mediaType="application/json" />
        </request>
        </method>
        </resource>
        <resource path="/embeddingcanvas/refreshForm">
        <method siena:requiresAuthentication="false" name="POST" id="RefreshForm" siena:isHostFunction="true">
        <doc title="Refresh the host model-driven form." />
        <request>
        <param style="header" name="Function" required="true" fixed="RefreshForm" />
        <param style="header" name="showPrompt" required="true" type="xs:string">
        <doc title="Show or hide a confirmation prompt to the user before saving changes." />
        </param>
        <representation mediaType="application/json" />
        </request>
        </method>
        </resource>
        <resource path="/embeddingcanvas/navigateToMainForm">
        <method siena:requiresAuthentication="false" name="POST" id="NavigateToMainForm" siena:isHostFunction="true">
        <doc title="Navigate the host window to a model-driven main form" />
        <request>
        <param style="header" name="Function" required="true" fixed="NavigateToMainForm" />
        <param style="header" name="entityName" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The parent entity of the form" />
        </param>
        <param style="header" name="mainFormName" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The name of the main form to display." />
        </param>
        <param style="header" name="recordId" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The ID of the record to display in the form." />
        </param>
        <representation mediaType="application/json" />
        </request>
        </method>
        </resource>
        <resource path="/embeddingcanvas/openQuickCreateForm">
        <method siena:requiresAuthentication="false" name="POST" id="OpenQuickCreateForm" siena:isHostFunction="true">
        <doc title=" Opens a quick create form in the host window" />
        <request>
        <param style="header" name="Function" required="true" fixed="OpenQuickCreateForm" />
        <param style="header" name="entityName" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The parent entity of the form." />
        </param>
        <representation mediaType="application/json" />
        </request>
        </method>
        </resource>
        <resource path="/embeddingcanvas/navigateToView">
        <method siena:requiresAuthentication="false" name="POST" id="NavigateToView" siena:isHostFunction="true">
        <doc title="Navigate the host window to a view." />
        <request>
        <param style="header" name="Function" required="true" fixed="NavigateToView" />
        <param style="header" name="entityName" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The parent entity of the view." />
        </param>
        <param style="header" name="viewName" type="xs:string" required="true">
        <doc title="The name of the view to display." />
        </param>
        </request>
        </method>
        </resource>
        </resources>
        </application>
